alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 11:19PM MDT until June 29 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until midnight MDT. * At 1118 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Midway, or 15 miles west of Akron, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Morgan County, including the following locations... Union. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
